comment: this professor was so nice. if i had a question she had no problem answering it and helping me 110%. we actually had a 7 page paper due and i told her i didnt have enough information and she gave me 2 extra days to complete it. attendace is mandatory, her in-class assignments add up and sometimes she gives bonus points for showing up.

This teacher is actually a fair grader. You write some papers in this class and discuss Sharon Astycks book, which is madness of itself. I liked this class, personally. If you write your first drafts and actually fix the errors, you will get a good grade. Attendence mandatory.

Did not learn much. We wrote a lot of papers. Most buy the books. If you had a bad paper you could ask her to turn it in on a later date for not points off. I would recommend if you are not going to be a writing major. Take only if you want a A/B in the class. Most come to classes for mandatory grade

I had a great time in her class. Although her assignments are not easy, you learn a lot about how to become a better writer. She's a fair grader, funny, and will give you plenty of help and guidance when she sees you've put in real effort.

Can't spell, can't explain the terms you will need to know for the rest of the english department.  She is not very helpful in class or waiting after class.  Very interested in group work, which means that some of the people in the class just get to fly by without doing anything.  Papers are difficult to write for any serious writers.

she's very quirky and is often laughing at her own jokes while teaching class. however, she is extremely helpful and willing to listen as long as you arent an ass. you dont have to write much, maybe 5 papers total..but she does expect alot.  lets out early usually!
The worest english teacher I ever had! TOUGH grader... seriously... RUN AND HIDE!!!!

She doesn't really teach much.  The class is fairly easy.  If you read what she assigns, you'll have no problem with writing your papers.  You have to write a lot, but it's easy.  It's easy to get a good grade.  She gives out a lot of 2 point quizes on the reading assignments, but she gives you 1 point just for putting your name.  I recommend her!!
Great Class, great teacher. Very helpful and approachable. Do the readings for this class and she will work very hard with you to get the grade.
she is very understanding. best english teacher i have ever had. she is very clear about her ansignments.
very good teacher. i had her for eng 1101 and 1102. very helpful. clear. she's kind of corny but a huge sense of humor. papers are easy and she is a lenient grader. ;0)
